import sys

# 引数読み込み
argvs = sys.argv
p = int(argvs[1])
q = int(argvs[2])
r = int(argvs[3])

# 出力
print(min(p + q, p + r, q + r))

import sys

readline = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, readline().split())

    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

readline = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, readline().split())

    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    p, q, r = map(int, input().split())

    print(min(p + q, q + r, r + p))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()



def main():
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

    print(min(a + b, b + c, c + a))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

# 引数読み込み(1,2,3番目)
argvs = sys.argv
p = int(argvs[1])
q = int(argvs[2])
r = int(argvs[3])

# 出力(最小値を出力)
print(min(p + q, p + r, q + r))


import sys

readline = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, readline().split())

    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P)) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-


import sys

readline = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, readline().split())

    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
